statements: SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, customer_name FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE alert_status = TRUE
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal'
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND alert_status = TRUE
SELECT DISTINCT account_id FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE alert_status = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 10000 AND alert_status = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, customer_name, transaction_type FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_type IN ('Deposit', 'Transfer') ORDER BY account_id ASC, customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND alert_status = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT id, account_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = true;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount), MAX(amount), MIN(amount) FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, l.log_message FROM suspicious_transactions AS t JOIN transaction_logs AS l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 456
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE suspicious_flag = true AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS alert_count FROM alerts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING alert_count > 3 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount < 500 OR t.suspicious_flag = true ORDER BY t.transaction_id ASC, c.customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT detail_id, detail_description FROM transaction_details WHERE note = 'Important';
SELECT transaction_id, audit_timestamp, audit_notes FROM transaction_audit ORDER BY audit_timestamp;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE suspicious_reason = 'Fraudulent' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' AND customer_address = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, detail_description, note FROM transaction_details WHERE detail_id > 100 AND transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000) ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_address LIKE '%Ave' OR contact_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT audit_id, transaction_id, audit_timestamp, SUBSTRING(audit_notes, 1, 50) AS short_notes FROM transaction_audit WHERE transaction_id = 1001 ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = true;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name, transaction_type, transaction_location FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT officer_id, officer_name, department FROM compliance_officers WHERE department = 'Compliance' ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, account_id FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
